website_summaries.verdict: One of the few drop slot safe options that features a top slot access hole for convenient storage.
pros: Digital keypad display makes it easy to access the contents of the safe whenever necessary
Metal construction is heat resistant in case of fire
Includes mounting bolts and AA batteries
cons: Fingerprint scanner is not as reliable as the key pad

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is that the diagonal slide inside stops some of ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent-love the built in alarm. The only thing I don't like is that the diagonal slide inside stops some of the envelopes from sliding all the way through and they get stuck at the bottom where it touches the inner wall of the safe and the slot to put the envelopes or money is a bit too wide, allowing someone with a long stick object to retrieve the envelopes or money that did not go through all the way. Therefore I suggest mounting it somewhere above eye level where they can still feel for the slot and deposit, but making it hard for someone to see and reach inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This arrive very quickly and was very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: This arrive very quickly and was very easy to set up. Next step is to bolt it to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. W. Hosking

customer_reviews.title: Great for small business
customer_reviews.text: Great safe! Nice size and drop slip at the top Is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jahmal Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to hold all your important documents, not fire or water proof, but I believe it would have to be in the center of the fire/flood, before anything inside the safe would be damaged. Seems to be quite heavy duty. Hope it never has to be fully tested:)
customer_reviews.author: Cooky

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the money but the front face plate is plastic and is not very sturdy. Unfortunately my face plate was busted, appears as if it was tightened to much from the factory, and stripped the plastic out. Only way to fix it is get bigger screws and fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to operate. Heavy duty. The top slot is very useful in easy and fast deposit.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: SereneLife Drop Box Safe.
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I could say something positive about the above safe but I cannot. I purchased this for my husband and returned it as it broke upon opening it. When I inserted the key, the housing broke and therefore returned the safe. This seems to be a very poorly made safe and would not recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: mary von fischer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the cost
customer_reviews.text: For the price we've never had any issues. It has holes in the bottom of the safe to secure it down. Has two combination codes that can be programmed and a physical key to open it should the battery die. I'm sure a crowbar could open the safe up if someone really wanted to get in, but it works well at our retail store with our employees.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip T

customer_reviews.title: Depends what you need it for.
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Like the key option. However, the jagged inside slot makes install a real pain. Also, after dropping 2-3 envelopes it gets backed up and you can't drop anymore. The drop slot is very small. Good for home use only really
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Olsen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAFE FOR THE VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Safe. Very easy to set up with the codes and the installation. 4 bolts down and two to the rear. Only took a few minutes to bolt down to a secure location. The drop slot in the top is great for someone to drop receipts into the box without having to give someone a code. I would recommend this safe over many I looked at before purchasing. Also, the price is a great value for the safe.
customer_reviews.author: BillC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Little Safe
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I was looking for a safe to keep cash/passport/small items- this is perfect. Seems very sturdy and I attached to the wall to prevent it from being taken easily if someone should break into my house. It was easy to set up the code and I like the safety net of having a key to get into the safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good safe box for the money
customer_reviews.text: bolts to bolt it down onto a wooden floor were not included just concrete anchors
customer_reviews.author: George

product_meta.title: SereneLife DropBox Safe Box | Safes & Lock Boxes | Front Loading Safe Cash Vault Drop Lock | Safe Security Box | Digital Safe Box | Money Safe Box | Steel Alloy Drop Safe Includes Keys (SLSFE348)
product_meta.description:
SereneLife Model : SLSFE348

ELECTRONIC SAFE BOX
ELECTRONIC SAFE BOX WITH MECHANICAL OVERRIDE, INCLUDES KEYS
Features:

 * Heavy-Duty, Rugged & Reliable Safe Box
 * Electronic Lock System with Mechanical Override
 * Includes (2) Keys for Manual Safe Access
 * Tamper Alarm: Siren Activates with Consecutive Invalid Entries
 * Digital Button Control Pad
 * Customizable Password/Key Code Setting
 * Convenient ‘Drop-in’ Slot Window for Documents/Bill Insertion
 * Reinforced Solid Steel Wall Construction
 * Dual Security Steel Door Locking Bolts
 * Corrosion & Stain-Resistant Powder Coat Finish
 * Pre-Drilled Anchor Holes for Wall/Floor Mounting
 * Perfect for Home, Office or Business Use


What’s in the Box:

 * Safe Box
 * Mounting Bolts
 * (2) Keys
 * (4) x ‘AA’ Batteries


Technical Specs:

 * Construction Material: Engineered Steel Alloy
 * Steel Thickness: 4mm Door, 2mm Body
 * Battery Operated Digital Panel: Requires 4 x ‘AA’ Batteries
 * Total Safe Dimensions (L x W x H): 15.0’’ x 11.8’’ x 11.8’’



The SereneLife Safe Box will keep your valuables secure & protected. Use the front panel digital button pad to easily control the electronic locking system. Enjoy hassle-free operation and quick access to your belongings after entering your customizable key code. The safe box also allows for manual access with (2) included keys. Additional features include rugged steel alloy construction, dual security steel door locking bolts, corrosion & stain-resistant powder coat finish, pre-drilled anchor holes for permanent mounting in a convenient location, along with a convenient slot ‘drop-in’ cutout window for depositing documents or bills without the need of unlocking. Store your valuables and keep them protected with the SereneLife Electronic Safe Box.
feature_bullets: STRONG & SECURE: The safe box is made of reinforced solid steel wall construction. Extra security includes a tamper alarm that activates a siren after consecutive invalid entry attempts.
EASY TO ACCESS: The drop box safe has a convenient slot ‘drop-in’ cutout window for depositing documents or bills without the need of unlocking.The key safe box includes two keys for manual access.
EASY TO INSTALL: The wall safe box has pre-drilled holes for wall or floor mounting. Includes mounting bolts, and four AA batteries to control the battery operated digital panel.

FINGER SENSOR TECHNOLOGY: The digital safe box features a digital touch screen control pad for added security. Users must use their thumb finger & should make sure the finger they use is dry & scar free.
PROTECT YOUR ASSETS: The key safe lock box is perfect for protecting guns, documents, jewelry, etc. Great for home, office or business use.
